name: Escape Hunt: The Lost Temples
description:
From Escape Hunt the world leader in live escape room games comes an incredible new puzzle adventure. Professor Antoine LeBlanc is missing, and only you can find him. Journey deep into mystical Temples of Khmer, using your detective skills to solve puzzles and uncover clues that will ultimately lead you to discover the missing Professor’s fate.

EXPERTS IN ESCAPE GAME DESIGN
Escape Hunt is the worldwide leader in escape room experiences with game centres in 27 countries. Escape Hunt game rooms have been enjoyed by over half a million players, with over 24 million minutes game time played.

STUNNING ENVIRONMENTS
From the jungles of Cambodia to the luxurious temples of the Khmer Kingdom, explore highly detailed locations and immerse yourself in rich, photorealistic 3D graphics.

CHALLENGING PUZZLES
Use logic and deduction to complete a variety of brain-teasing challenges, piecing together clues and collecting items for your inventory to help solve future puzzles.

PICK-UP-AND-PLAY DESIGN
With intuitive controls and an easy-to-use interface, Escape Hunt: The Lost Temples can be enjoyed by everyone, regardless of gaming ability.

PUZZLES GALORE!
Travelling through ancient temples, rooms, courtyards, cellars and more, you’re faced with a variety of challenging puzzles to keep you guessing and entertained for hours and hours.

HINTS
Struggling to complete a challenge? Access optional hints in your notebook to help solve puzzles and move on to the next room.

***BECAUSE OF THE AMAZING GRAPHICS THAT YOU WILL LOVE, YOUR DEVICE MUST HAVE AT LEAST 2GB RAM AND BE RUNNING ANDROID 5.0 (LOLLIPOP) OR ABOVE FOR THE GAME TO RUN SMOOTHLY***
